description: Kiyoshi is an young Trainer that lives in a town near Shala City. Rocket Gang dressed up as Ash Ketchum and his friends in order to discredit them. They forced a battle on Kiyoshi who didn`t want his Yancham to battle. He told them he`d report them to Officer Jenny. Later that day he met the real Ash Ketchum and his friends but realized they weren`t the people he`d confronted earlier in the day.
name: Kiyoshi
